title.narrative: Support to macroeconomic and institutional reforms in Tanzania (2006-2010)

description.narrative:
The overall objective of this programme is to support poverty reduction by financially contributing to the implementation of Tanzania's poverty reduction strategy (PRS), while maintaining macroeconomic stability. This includes supporting the Government's economic and social reform policies.
The implementation of Tanzania's PRS is supported through the provision of budget support. Additionally, the following three reform programmes are supported through earmarked funding: a) public financial management reform; b) public service reform; and c) legal sector reform.
Tanzania's PRS is closely monitored through a well-defined framework. Moreover, annual budget support reviews provide a thorough assessment of the PRS implementation process. A number of concrete areas, which are related to Tanzania's PRS, are regularly assessed and discussed during the annual review.
